channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger urges vote against new California districts
item.description: Arnold Schwarzenegger on Monday entered the national battle over U.S. House control, urging voters to reject a California ballot proposal to rejigger ...

item.title: Antifa Is Responsible For Charlie Kirk’s Assassination
item.description: What people often fail to understand is that for Antifa, 'anti-fascism' isn’t just a thing you are, it’s a thing you do.

item.title: There Can Be No Peace Or Unity With A Violent, Unrepentant Left
item.description: Enough with the false, lazy rhetoric blaming 'both sides' for political violence in the wake of Charlie Kirk’s murder.

item.title: Clemson Fires Employee Who Allegedly Urged Others To Be Like Charlie Kirk’s Killer
item.description: The university also said it has pulled two faculty members from their teaching duties after troubling posts justifying Kirk's murder.

item.title: In Defense of John Bolton
item.description: MAGA owes a lot to his vision for American foreign policy.

item.title: Will Ukraine Cost the GOP the Midterms?
item.description: Allowing Putin to continue his onslaught against a smaller democratic ally could be the straw that breaks Republican majorities in 2026.

item.title: President Trump Deserves a Nobel Peace Prize for Operation Warp Speed
item.description: Creating and distributing a Covid vaccine in under a year was more than a medical achievement. It was a triumph of American greatness and leadership.

item.title: Appeals court rejects Trump bid to unseat Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook
item.description: A federal appeals court Monday rejected President Trump's move to fire Federal Reserve board member Lisa Cook.

item.title: Spanberger Refuses To Renounce Endorsement From School Board Chair Who Celebrated Charlie Kirk’s Assassination
item.description: 'Call me old fashioned, but I remember when we used to be okay with shooting Nazis.'

item.title: Trump administration joins Republicans' campaign to police speech in reaction to Kirk's murder
item.description: Vice President JD Vance on Monday jumped onto the conservative movement demanding consequences for those who have cheered Charlie Kirk's killing, call...

item.title: Trump says he would have lowered flags for Minnesota slayings if asked. But he didn't call governor
item.description: President Donald Trump defended his order that flags be lowered to half-staff after last week's slaying of conservative activist Charlie Kirk by sugge...

item.title: Georgia's highest court rejects Fani Willis' appeal of her removal from Trump election case
item.description: Georgia's highest court has denied Fulton County District Attorney Fani Willis' request for it to review her ability to prosecute President Trump and ...

item.title: Republicans Shouldn’t Cave on Obamacare Expansion
item.description: With a shutdown looming, Democrats are demanding that the majority extend Covid-era funding for health insurance subsidies.

item.title: Leftist Commentator ‘Destiny’: If You Wanted Charlie Kirk Alive, You Shouldn’t Have Elected Trump
item.description: Like Democrats, Destiny also has a long, documented history of encouraging and even celebrating political violence against conservatives.

item.title: The Atlantic’s Court Historian
item.description: Jill Lepore cuts corners in her case against originalism.
